title: AI can write your emails, reports, and essays. But can it express your emotions? Should it?
description: If AI-written vows, eulogies, speeches, love letters, apologies, poems, or songs become ubiquitous, are they still meaningful?

title: How LG's magical steam closet could save you time and money
description: The LG Styler will refresh, sanitize, and dry everything from your work clothes to your weekend attire. But is it worth it?

title: This $19 iPhone accessory is my secret to taking the best photos
description: Forget the fancy lenses and gimbals, my most-used iPhone photography accessory costs under $20 and does exactly what I need it to do.

title: iPhone users, this smart lock was literally made for you
description: The Level Lock+ has its pros and cons, but one key feature makes it a must-have accessory for iPhone users.

title: Telstra admonished for cutting mobile service without sufficient notice to customers
description: The Australian mobile carrier was given a formal warning after it suspended or limited services for more than 5,400 customers over unpaid bills.
